articles.title: MARGARET THATCHER - BRITAIN'S â€˜IRON LADY' REALLY DID CHANGE THE WORLD
articles.subtitle: The pioneer
articles.article: Thatcher was a strong political leader who had a significant impact not only on britain, but on Europe and world politics. a global champion of free market economy, she pulled her country back from 35 years of socialism and gave millions of her countrymen the opportunity to do better for themselves and their families.
